summary: This bill, the Informing Veterans on Education for Transitioning Servicemembers Act of 2025, aims to improve the awareness of veterans about educational programs. It directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to regularly promote programs under chapter 31 of title 38, United States Code, specifically the Veteran Readiness and Employment Program. This promotion includes sending letters to eligible veterans explaining the benefits and providing a side-by-side comparison of benefits with those under chapter 33, both in the letter and on the Department's website.
